thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Jeff Alvernaz
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Jeff Alvernaz

author: Jeff Alvernaz
title: Jeff Alvernaz
text: Have made many orders with BG in the past and usually receive within a normal time frame and in good condition. I had a couple instances (part missing and package got lost in mail because never received) emailed customer service, and received an email making sure everything was correct on sending me replacements. Very happy to get issues resolved fast and friendly. Will continue ordering from them without hesitation. Thanks BG!
